The Card class represents a single card in a deck of playing cards for a blackjack game.

The Deck class represents a deck of 52 playing cards used in a blackjack game.

The Game class implements the core logic of a blackjack game.

H

hasBlackjack() - Method in class org.example.Player
Checks if the player has a blackjack, which occurs when the player has exactly two cards and the hand value equals 21.

org.example - package org.example
 

P

play() - Method in class org.example.Game
Starts the game loop, which includes dealing cards, handling turns for the player and the dealer, determining the winner, and asking the player if they wish to continue playing or end the game.
